tests.explanation: The original program returns -1 if it doesn't find the value in the array. The mutant program removed the condition in the for loop that checks for the length variable being greater than zero, creating an infinite loop in case the value is not found. This test contains a value not present in the array, resulting in different output.

This test has a repeated value in the array, decreasing the chance of an off-by-one error. The mutant code will still find the first occurrence of the value and return its index, thus resulting in different output.
This test has a value not present in the array, so both programs should return -1. The different output in the mutant program is due to the same reason as the previous test case.
